DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Chemoprevention use certain drug keep cancer form . Eating diet high isoflavones , compound find soy food , may keep cancer forming . PURPOSE : This randomized phase III trial study effect dietary soy estrogen breast fluid , blood , urine sample healthy woman .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Dietary Soy Estrogens Breast Fluid , Blood , Urine Samples From Healthy Women
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Examine effect two daily serving soy estrogen level nipple aspirate fluid ( NAF ) serum . - Investigate cytologic pattern epithelial breast cell obtain NAF measure proliferation relation soy intake . - Explore effect two daily serving soy cytochrome alteration estrogen metabolism express formation urinary 2- , 16α- , 4-hydroxy estrogen metabolite . - Compare estrogen level NAF serum measure time luteal phase . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Participants randomize 1 2 intervention arm . - Arm I : Participants partake high soy diet consist 2 daily soy serving ( approximately 50mg isoflavones ) . The choice soy food include ½ cup tofu , ¾ cup soy milk , ¼ cup soy nut . Replacement currently consume food soy food encourage . - Arm II : Participants ask keep soy intake 3 serving per week . The participant also receive general nutrition counseling . In arm , intervention continue 6 month . After 6 month , participant undergo 1-month washout period cross-over intervention arm . Nipple aspirate fluid , urine , blood sample collect periodically measure laboratory endpoint .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Healthy participant No diagnosis cancer PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Premenopausal Regular menstrual cycle PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not take birth control pills hormone
